message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $60, you get $40.
I think we can do better than that, let's meet in the middle-ish.
The value is decreasing Bob, I'll take a bit more this round to meet you closer to the middle.
I know the value is decreasing for me, but I think we can still find a better compromise.
This is getting ridiculous Bob, take this offer before the money is worth even less for you!
